entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • vscode error while fetching extensions XHR failed #17962
  • PerformFetch iOS lifecycle delegate lacking an extension method #17960
  • Navigating back from a TabbedPage does not invoked a destructor #17959
    .NET 8 GA
  • Entry not getting focused if we want to set focus at the time when new activity opens #17954
  • [MAUI] D17 page when click on some empty space, the editor 2 is still focused #17953
  • [MAUI] G3 and G7 pages do not have "Page" menu bar on ios, maccatalyst and android #17952
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.2.9373] AmbiguousMatchException thrown for overloaded methods called from xaml event #17950
  • TapGestureRecognizers not working #17948
    .NET 8 GA

Closed

  • Border size changes appear to be animated on iOS/MacCatalyst #15363
    Backlog
  • Restore packages fails with error NU1605 when Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility version is 8.0.0-rc.2.9373 #17951
    .NET 8 GA
  • [MAUI] SplashScreen resize=false failed to work on iOS. #17924
  • [MAUI] Recipe splash screen logo missing on iOS #17925
  • Maui Splash Screen will not update on iOS App #17940
  • The current activity cannot be detected #17944

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixes iOS Elastic Scrolling #6689 #17963
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Update .NET versions to be the latest public release on nuget.org #17961
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 SR1
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 2 updates #17956
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 SR1
  • Only attach log files for current test #17949
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Update Blazor Hybrid template to match ASP.NET Core Blazor Web template #17946
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄

Merged

  • Use Cake for running integration tests #17964
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 SR1
  • [net8.0] Update to rtm versions #17904
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Bump the aspnetcore group with 7 updates #17957
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump powershell from 7.3.7 to 7.3.8 #17958
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net8.0] Reverting default item and globbing updates #17852
    .NET 8 GA
  • Update README.md #17941
    community ✨
  • API Doc improvements to fix online browser warnings #17732
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17947
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Make Entitlements in Templates for MacCatalyst more consistent between debug and release configs. #17833
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1
  • Improves performance on BindableProperty #17756
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Merge `net8.0` into `main` #17906
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Add remapping extensions for core #17918
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Removes freeze using SecureStorage #17928
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞
  • Android Ecosystem updates - AndroidX #17318
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Fix ScrollView filling layouts #17243
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] Keep textcolor on characterspacing #17926
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Correctly clear text tapping the clear button on Entry #17543
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Windows] Fix issue using Connectivity from a background thread #17903
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, .NET 8 SR1
  • Fix legacy logical children to correctly add/remove #17410
    t/bug, control-swipeview, .NET 9 Planning
  • Bump the androidx group with 15 updates #17793
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image, stale, Under Consideration
  • Avoid NRE if no shell items are visible #16946
    area/shell 🐢, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image, Under Consideration
  • Fix OnPlatform + Setter when no match for current platform #17061
    area/Xaml </>, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Fix wrong gray color using transparent in iOS gradients #17696
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] Fix ContentPage BackgroundImageSource not working #17789
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Fix shadow scaling issue #17902
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, Under Consideration
  • `sealed` some `internal` classes in `Controls.Core` that are not inherited from (1) #17669
    community ✨
  • `sealed` some `internal` classes in `Controls.Core` that are not inherited from (2) #17671
    community ✨
  • Enable more legacy tests #17931
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Android] Avoid issues creating a Borderless Entry with a custom Handler #17778
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 8 SR1
  • Fixed null coalesce issues #17920
  • [Windows] Fix wrong Layout from hidden CollectionView #17659
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix RefreshView loading indicator position #17647
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows] Implement gestures on Spans #17731
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-label, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 SR2
  • [Android] Fix Button Ripple Effect not working #17821
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, .NET 8 SR1
